Introduction to CSS

Learn how to style websites using Cascading Style Sheets

What is CSS?

CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It is used to style and layout web pages, for example to change colors, fonts, spacing, and positioning.

Why CSS is Important?

CSS separates content from design, makes websites responsive, and improves user experience across different devices.

CSS Features

  • Colors and Fonts
  • Layouts and Positioning
  • Animations and Transitions
  • Responsive Design
